text: Christian music is music about God, Jesus Christ and Christianity. Worship songs are found in the Jewish Psalms in the Bible. ==Styles== Every type of music genre and style is found in Christian music, including country, pop, easy listening, urban/hip hop, rock and hymns. ==Artists== Artists include Bach, TobyMac, Phil Keaggy, Tenth Avenue North and Hillsong. ==Related pages== * Requiem * Church music * Amazing Grace * Gregorian chant * Be Thou My Vision * History of Christianity Category:Christianity Category:Christian music Category:History of Christianity
title: Christian music
